sentences.en: After crossing demur period, province hall will award prize formally.
sentences.cn: 过异议期后, 省厅将正式颁奖.

sentences.en: Butcher blinks, demur did not say, hand me readily mop, clinch a deal!
sentences.cn: 小贩眨了眨眼, 二话没说, 爽快地把墩布递给我, 成交!

sentences.en: Firsthands over the name card without demur instead some reluctantly.
sentences.cn: 二话不说先递名片反而有些勉强.

sentences.en: He accepted the criticism without demur.
sentences.cn: 他毫无异议地接受了批评.

sentences.en: It would seem hazardous to demur at ( to ) a proposition which is so widely accepted.
sentences.cn: 对一项如此广泛地接受的建议表示反对似乎是危险的.

sentences.en: O'Brien's servant, however, had admitted the two of them without demur.
sentences.cn: 但是, 奥勃良 的仆人二话不说, 让他们两人进来.

sentences.en: Of course, athletes rarely demur when offered a gently used medal.
sentences.cn: 当然, 对于接受二手奖牌,运动员们很少提出异议.

sentences.en: The students demur to too much homework.
sentences.cn: 学生们反对太多家庭作业.

sentences.en: They demurred politely, but finally agreed to stay.
sentences.cn: 他们礼貌地推却，但最后还是同意留下。

sentences.en: What? I am nobody and worthless? I demur at your words , brat short man interrupts.
sentences.cn: “什么? 我不是东西? 小子我反对你的说法!”矮人叫.

sentences.en: Whether is carrying Cheng to giving two my guarantee slip false guarantee slip still exists demur?
sentences.cn: 是否携程对给我的两份保单是假保单依然存在异议?

trans.tran_cn: 提出异议, 反对, 抗辩, 犹豫
trans.tran_en: to express doubt about or opposition to a plan or suggestion
